channel.title: Help with vps please? keep gtting connection refused on client
channel.description: so i bought a vps 2 days ago from trentahost.com which i shouldnt have but its my first time with a vps. its ddos windows protected vps. so i set everything up right, i put port 43594 in firewall exception under UDP and TCP in inbound rules. i set my environmental variables. an i changed ip's and ports to the ones of my vps. the source runs fine. but when i run the client i get a connection refused error, ill post it below, and please dont tell me my cache is effed up or my client is crap lol thats not the problem i promise you :D _______________________________________________________________________ Error: jn.a() fb.d() lk.a() client.er() | Class225.method2094:57 Class125.method 1401:283 Class275.method2573:59 client.method2806:3711 client.method2773:641 Cla ss291.method2764:641 Class291.method2759:457 Class291.run:384 java.lang.Thread.r un:744 | java.lang.RuntimeException | null 0,0,0,0 0,0,0, 2 0 2 item.title: Help with vps please? keep gtting connection refused on client
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Shit happens when you buy shit from a reseller who lives on rune-server.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with vps please? keep gtting connection refused on client

item.title: Help with vps please? keep gtting connection refused on client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hi, so I’ve said this a million times too.
We are not trentahost. We are not your VPS provider (same thing). We have no control over them. Unlike with RSPS, we can easily modify the code or give you examples, based on what you provide.
This is a problem you must bring up with them, not us.
Go to http://canyouseeme.org and test port 43594. If it comes up as refused (same error you see in the client), tell trenta.
Tell them you “need help opening port 43594”. They will assist you in guaranteeing the port is open.

Please note that with your client & server, the server must be fully online and accepting connections before the client can connect.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with vps please? keep gtting connection refused on client
